==== Definition of psychotherapy ====
Any use of psychological means to treat a psychiatric disorder or for [[Know the definition of psychotherapy OIC-073-01-A#%20msocom%201|[FB1]]] any other non-psychiatric problem causing psychological suffering or distress
----[[Know the definition of the term psychotherapy OIC-073-01-A#%20msoanchor%201|[FB1]]]<nowiki/>for too much?

question.question: What is the definition of psychotherapy?
question.option_a: A type of medication used to treat psychiatric disorders
question.option_b: A form of physical exercise to reduce stress and anxiety
question.option_c: The use of psychological means to treat a psychiatric disorder or any other non-psychiatric problem causing psychological suffering or distress
question.option_d: A type of surgical procedure to treat mental health issues
